questions:
What is the main subject of the photo?
A) A landscape
B) A statue
C) A building
D) A painting

A) A historical figure
B) An animal
C) A religious figure
D) A famous artist

What is the statue made of?
A) Wood
B) Metal
C) Marble or stone
D) Glass

A) A bench
B) Plants and greenery
C) A fountain
D) A pathway

A) A lake
B) A building wall
C) A mountain range
D) A playground

B) Palm trees

B) White
C) Bronze

A) "In memory of"

D) "In honor of
